name: System Superuser
description: Grants full access to every resource in the system. Bypasses all checks.

name: Company Manager
description: Can create and manage company entities and their settings.

name: Group Manager
description: Can manage user groups and forum moderation.

name: Content Editor
description: Can create and edit blog content globally.

name: Standard Member
description: Basic access. Can read content and edit their OWN profile (ABAC).

name: Shop Owner (ABAC Example)
description: Can manage shops, but ONLY if they are the listed owner of that shop.
